page.title: 10FARM STUDY 1
page.content: The farm has 300sheep,32 cows,12000 turkeys.They feed the turkeys on their own mix of cereal,fishbone,grassmeal, meat and bone meal,soya meal and limestone.The latter makes the eggshells harder.They do not breed their own turkeys but buy them in as day old poults from the hatchery.These are put in large sheds with the temperature maintained at 30 degrees Centigrade and as they get older the temp. is reduced gradually. When the turkeys are fully grown they are moved to the fattening sheds,they are slaughtered after 20-30 weeks.After slaughtering they are deep frozen(down to -30 degrees Cent.).It takes a day for this to happen but for large turkeys it may take two days.They also rear chickens for fattening and they kill approx.800 chickens a day.
